field.name: soap_query
field.label: com_thm_organizer_SOAP_QUERY
field.query: SELECT majors.id AS value, CONCAT(degrees.name, ' ', majors.subject, ' (', majors.po, ')') AS soap_query FROM #__thm_curriculum_majors as majors INNER JOIN #__thm_curriculum_degrees as degrees ON degrees.id = majors.degree_id

field.name: color_id
field.label: com_thm_organizer_SUBMENU_MODULMAPPINGS_COLOR
field.query: SELECT id AS value, name AS color_id FROM #__thm_curriculum_colors ORDER by name
